IBUPLUSB.MX.summary: IBUPLUS, S.A. de CV, INVESTMENT COMPANY EQUITY (IBUPLUS, (the "Company" or the "Fund") is an open investment company whose objective is to search for its shareholders the highest possible return consistent with the investment regime and ranking. Society, to achieve this goal, acquire investment assets whose nature corresponds to shares, stocks and securities or documents representing a debt owed by a third party (the "Investment Assets" or "Securities") with the Proceeds from the placement of shares of its capital from the public investor.
